amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill for the Food Stamp Program may be spent in noncompliance of current Federal law which requires that an affidavit be filed by a sponsor stating that an alien will not become a public charge.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds provided in Act from being expended in contravention of section 213a of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1183a).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 266 - 153 (Roll no. 189).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 266 - 153 (Roll no. 189).
